to follow everywhere/to always be there for sb at their beck and call
saddle point (math.), a critical point of a function of several variables that is neither a maximum nor a minimum

sentences.english: It is shown that the model undergoes saddle-node bifurcation and Hopf bifurcation.
sentences.chinese: 該模型經歷了鞍結點分支和霍普夫分支。

sentences.english: By six o'clock the horses were all saddled, the grub wagon ready.
sentences.chinese: 六點鐘，馬都備了鞍，裝糧食的大車也安排就緒。

sentences.english: Rememeber you just learned to ride side-saddle.
Saddle heights can be uneven, requiring regrinding or shimming .
sentences.chinese: 弦鞍高低不均，有個體差異，還需要重新打磨或墊高。

sentences.english: Clothes make the man / woman, as they say.
sentences.chinese: 人靠衣服馬靠鞍，愛情也靠穿。

sentences.english: Clothes make the man , nor love by wear.
sentences.chinese: 人靠衣服馬靠鞍，愛情也靠穿。

sentences.english: The characteristic of trigeminal nerve tumor was that the tumor extended from pons cerebellum angle to juxtasella.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤從橋小腦角延伸到鞍旁是三叉神經瘤的特點。

sentences.english: Harnesses and saddles are practically the same.
sentences.chinese: 就連騎具和鞍都死一樣的。

sentences.english: The fault of the ass must not be laid upon the packsaddle.
Riding a griffon requires an exotic saddle.
sentences.chinese: 騎一隻獅鷲需要一種特殊的鞍。

sentences.english: He took up a sack of grain and with ease pitched it over a packsaddle.
sentences.chinese: 他拎起一口代糧食，毫不費力的地把它拋到馱鞍上。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the early diagnosis, surgery approach and technique of tuberculum sellae meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鞍結節腦膜瘤的早期診斷，手術入路技巧。
